interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NeWisdom 72 PCS Toddler Girls Hair Accessory Set with Gift Packing Organization Box, Gifts for Grandkids, Cute Hair Bows Hair Clips Hair Bands for Girls Toddlers, Multi-Style Elastic Hair Ties Hair Accessories for Baby Girls Age 3 4 5 6
Review Date: 2019/07/24
Store: NeWisdom
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'NeWisdom', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'GirlsKit', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Babies', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '10.83 x 7.28 x 1.77 inches; 14.57 Ounces', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '5 months and up', 'Item model number': 'NW-GirlsKit-36Grid', 'Department': 'Baby-girls', 'UPC': '778942698455', 'Manufacturer': 'NeWisdom'}
Review Text: I think the pony tail holders may work for my little girls but the clips - definitely not. The clips are literally all the same just with different accessories glued on. I'm sure my girls will be able to use them on their dolls. Such a shame. The organizer box though is nice! I'm sure I'll be able to use it for something else.
Review Title: Junky
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
UV Light for Nails,LKE Curing Lamp for Gel Nail Polish 54W UV Led Light Gel Nail Starter Kit Nail Dryer Accessories LKE {'Brand': 'LKE', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Number of Light Sources': '2', 'Wattage': '54 watts', 'Control Method': 'App', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.45 x 8.7 x 5.08 inches; 2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required.'} I just wan't ya'll to know.. I have never given myself a gel polish manicure in my LIFE before yesterday. I had been wanting to for the longest time, but I wasn't 100% prepared to make the commitment to purchasing the light and the top coats and the bottom coats and the paint, etc, etc..

Well if you are on the fence, jump it!

First of all, the lamp works. You set your timer and once you do that, all you have to do is put your hand it and it starts automatically. Awesome! Like a real salon. I was able to do my hands in 45 minutes. It would have been even faster but I did a test run on my thumb before doing them all at once to make sure I didn't mess anything up.

Overall, I am SO happy to have this nail curing lamp! Salon Perfect Nails! NeWisdom 72 PCS Toddler Girls Hair Accessory Set with Gift Packing Organization Box, Gifts for Grandkids, Cute Hair Bows Hair Clips Hair Bands for Girls Toddlers, Multi-Style Elastic Hair Ties Hair Accessories for Baby Girls Age 3 4 5 6 NeWisdom {'Brand': 'NeWisdom', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'GirlsKit', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Babies', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '10.83 x 7.28 x 1.77 inches; 14.57 Ounces', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '5 months and up', 'Item model number': 'NW-GirlsKit-36Grid', 'Department': 'Baby-girls', 'UPC': '778942698455', 'Manufacturer': 'NeWisdom'} I think the pony tail holders may work for my little girls but the clips - definitely not. The clips are literally all the same just with different accessories glued on. I'm sure my girls will be able to use them on their dolls. Such a shame. The organizer box though is nice! I'm sure I'll be able to use it for something else. Junky
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interest in Nail Care**: Strong preference for DIY nail care, particularly gel manicures. The user is enthusiastic about achieving salon-quality results at home.
- **First-Time User**: Recently started using gel polish, showcasing a willingness to learn and engage with new beauty techniques.
- **Positive Experience with Technology**: Values user-friendly technology, as demonstrated by their satisfaction with the ease of operation of gel curing lamps with automatic timer functions.
- **Emphasis on Efficiency**: Prioritizes efficiency in application, reflected in their interest in quick completion of manicures.
- **Encouraging for Others**: Actively recommends products to friends and family, indicating a tendency to share positive experiences and guide hesitant users in the beauty community.
- **Satisfaction with Purchase**: Generally satisfied with beauty tools purchased, fostering a favorable view of future similar acquisitions.

- **Diverse Interests**: Recently expanded interests to include children’s accessories, indicating a flexibility in exploring products beyond personal beauty tools.
- **Critical Evaluation**: Demonstrates a critical eye when reviewing products, as reflected in both positive and negative feedback about usability and quality.
- **Practical Approach**: Shows a practical mindset by appreciating functional aspects like organization but is also discerning about the quality of the products used for personal or family use.

This profile emphasizes a user who is curious, open to new experiences, and enjoys sharing insights with others while maintaining a practical and critical approach to product evaluations.
